DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . The aim trial compare glycaemic control subject initiate biphasic insulin aspart 30 treatment follow intensified treatment treatment target HbA1c 7 % reach OAD ( oral anti-diabetic drug ) alone .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 Treatment Regimens Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Not Achieving HbA1c Treatment Targets OADs Alone
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart , insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed type 2 diabetes minimum 6 month prior Visit 1 HbA1c least 7.0 % maximum 11 % screen Subject insulin na√Øve ( shortterm insulin treatment 14 day allow ) An antidiabetic regimen stable least 3 month prior screen An antidiabetic regimen include minimum 2 OADs OADs dose least 50 % maximum recommend dose Known suspect hypersensitivity trial product ( ) relate product Females childbearing potential pregnant , breastfeed intend become pregnant use adequate contraceptive method ( adequate contraceptive measure require local law practice ) The receipt investigational medicinal product within one month prior trial Suffer life threaten disease ( cancer ) Cardiac disease : class III IV congestive heart failure ( CHF ) , unstable angina , myocardial infarction ( treat untreated ) within 6 month prior screen Hepatic insufficiency ( Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) Aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) 2 time central laboratory 's upper reference limit ) Renal insufficiency ( serum creatinine 1.6 mg/dl male ; 1.4 mg/dl female Recurrent hypoglycaemia hypoglycaemic unawareness Anemia ( haemoglobin 10 mg/dl )
